ai.susi.mind

Class SusiAwareness

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.susi.mind.SusiAwareness

  • public class SusiAwareness
extends java.lang.Object
    Awareness is a sequence of cognitions. The first entry always has the latest cognition

    • Method Detail

      • getTime

        public int getTime()
        perception of time this is a silly method that defines the perception of time as the length of the cognition sequence
        Returns:
        an abstract number regarding the perception of time

      • learn

        public SusiAwareness learn(SusiCognition cognition)
        learning a new cognition means that we store it to our memory. New cognitions become first in the list of stored cognitions to be more visible then older cognitions
        Parameters:
        cognition -
        Returns:
        self

      • forgetOldest

        public SusiCognition forgetOldest()
        Forgetting the oldest cognition: this is an important operation to prevent that we memorize too many cognitions all the time. Too many cognitions would mean to have a too strong attention which may be exhausting (for memory and CPU)
        Returns:
        the cognition which was forgot or NULL if no cognition was forgot

      • limitAwareness

        public java.util.List<SusiCognition> limitAwareness(int attention)
        Limit the cognition up to an attention limit
        Parameters:
        attention - the required attention limit (maximum number of cognitions)
        Returns:
        list of cognitions which are forgotten, latest first

      • getLatest

        public SusiCognition getLatest()
        Being aware of the latest cognition: get the latest
        Returns:
        the latest cognition that this virtual being learned

      • getCognitions

        public java.util.List<SusiCognition> getCognitions()
        Get a list of all cognitions.
        Returns:
        a list of cognitions, reverse order (latest first)

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object

      • readMemory

        public static SusiAwareness readMemory(java.io.File memorydump,
                                       int attentionTime)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        produce awareness by reading a memory dump up to a given attention time
        Parameters:
        memorydump - file where the memory is stored
        attentionTime - the maximum number of cognitions within the required awareness
        Returns:
        awareness for the give time
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
